data.title: Vatac Valve Corporation
data.text:
Vatac's roots can be traced back to the middle of 20th century, when the family of manufacturing facility set up a valve stem business in the Home town of P&V China. Over time, that business evolved, first in 1979 as the Vatac Spare Parts Factory, by which it is known today. Over the decades, Vatac has expanded its expertise across industries and around the world. Today, it is active in more than 20 industries. Vatac has been at the forefront of innovation in designing, engineering, construction, and maintenance, led by visionary management and a global team of committed experts.

From a family work-shop to a modernized enterprise, Vatac has gone through over 30 years of development experience. For over 30 years, Vatac has been providing complete solutions for OPG and Pipeline Industries around the world.

» In July, 1977, Chairman of Vatac started his experience in the valve manufacturing

» In Sept, 1985, the predecessor of Vatac Valves Corp established, Main products covering Oil Field Valves & Choke Valves etc.

» In Aug, 1995, Constructed its 5000 square meters factories.

» In Feb, 2002, invested 25,000,000 RMB to carry on the great technical renewal.

» In July, 2003, wins "the star enterprise"evaluated by the county government.

» In Aug, 2003, became the member of Wenzhou Pump&valve Industrial Association.

» In July, 2003,the products win the honor of "Zhejiang Province high quality valve product".

» In September, 2003, Approved by ISO9001 International Quality Control System

» In Oct, 2003, the choke valve wins the honor of "Zhejiang Quality Trustworthy Product".

» In Dec, 2003, the modernized manufacturing plant is set up with an investment capital up to RMB 50M

» In December, 2003, became member of Chinese General Mechanical Valve Profession Association

» In April, 2004, became the Level Supply Network member of the Chinese Petroleum Natural& Gas Main corporation (CNPC)

» In Dec, 2004, becomes the supply member of National Electric power Company (CHINA POWER COMPANY)

» In Aug, 2004, becomes one of the 30 strong enterprises in the hometown of Chinese valves& pumps.

» In Sept, 2004, obtains the manufacture permission certificate by the National Quality testing Bureau pressure piping part.

» In November, 2004, obtains the import and export right for overseas market.

» In April, 2005, was recognized for the Zhejiang enterprise AA level, defends the contract and heavy credit enterprise.

» In July, 2005, obtains the famous trademark in the county.

» In Dec, 2005, becomes the standardized good behavior enterprise.

» In Feb, 2006, becomes the measurement examination system qualified enterprise.

» In Feb, 2006, obtained the ISO 14001, ISO 18001 & CE PED Authentication.

» In Aug, 2008, Set up its joint veture with Vatac Inc. USA to expand its capabilities in Valves designing and manufacturing

» In Jan, 2009, Vatac is nominated as its trademark for overseas market promotion.
